explains: n. 微观世界；小宇宙；作为宇宙缩影的人类；缩图（等于 microcosmos）

sentences.en: The family is a microcosm of society.
Kitchell says the city was a microcosm of all American culture during the '60s.
sentences.cn: 基切尔说这个城市曾经是60年代所有美国文化的一个缩影。

sentences.en: Schools are not just a microcosm of society; they mediate it too.
sentences.cn: 学校不仅仅是社会的缩影；它们也会调解。
